mapper.select: SELECT R.* , P.PRODUCT_TITLE , B.MEM_NICK AS BUYERNICK, S.MEM_NICK AS SELLERNICK FROM MYREVIEW R JOIN PRODUCT P ON R.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID JOIN MEMBER S ON S.MEM_ID = P.MEM_ID -- 판매자 닉네임 JOIN MEMBER B ON B.MEM_ID = R.MEM_ID -- 구매자 닉네임 WHERE P.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} ORDER BY R.REVIEW_DATE DESC
